forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow will become heavy at times this afternoon. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow will become heavy at times this afternoon. High 28F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will transition to snow showers late. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 13F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 32F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 9F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 12F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 38F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
